name: mycred-gb-blocks/mycred-transfers
title: Transfer
description: A block to create a transfer form for users to transfer points to others.

pay_to.description: The recipient of the transfer. Can be left empty for user selection.

show_balance.description: Whether to show the current user's balance.

show_limit.description: Whether to show the current user's transfer limit.

types.description: Comma-separated list of point types that can be transferred.

excluded.description: Message to display when the user is excluded from making transfers.

amount.description: Amount of points to be transferred.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the recipient input field.

ref.description: Reference for the transfer. Used for logging purposes.
